lines: 1. Holy, holy, holy! Lord God Almighty! Early in the morning our song shall rise to Thee Holy, holy, holy! merciful and mighty! God in three persons, blessed Trinity!
2. Holy, holy, holy! Angels adore Thee, Casting down their bright crowns around the glassy sea; Thousands and ten thousands worship low before Thee, Which wert, and art, and evermore shalt be.
3. Holy, holy, holy! Though darkness hide Thee, Though the eye of sinful man Thy glory may not see; Only Thou art holy; there is none beside, Perfect in power, in love and purity.
4. Holy, holy, holy! Lord God Almighty! All Thy works shall praise Thy name in earth and sky and sea; Holy, holy, holy! merciful and mighty! God in three persons, blessed Trinity!
